name: Ninh Binh
description: About 100 km from Hanoi, Ninh Binh is located on the Red River Delta and well-known with diversity of lakes, forests, famous historical and cultural relics. The full-day tour features a visit to Hoa Lu, the ancient royal capital of Great Viet - the first centralized feudal state in Vietnam Dai Viet (968 - 1009) - to contemplate King Dinh and King Le's temples. Beside the historical relics, you can enjoy the natural beauty of Ninh Binh when visiting Thien Ha grottos (Milky Way Grotto). A boat ride along Ben Dang river will take you to the wet and dry grottos to explore the most fascinating and wondrous stalactities and stalagmites. A Vietnamese set lunch is also included.
